cause.description: Basic Rights Oregon is a statewide grassroots organization dedicated to ending discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity. Online at basicrights.org. 1. Everyone deserves to live free of the sting of discrimination. 2. Everyone should be able to protect their families in times of crisis. 3. Fairness is a basic Oregon value.
cause.mission: Ending discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity.
cause.name: Basic Rights Oregon
